name: product_sales_value
description: Show total sales value and won deal counts grouped by product.

name: product_price_range
description: Show minimum, maximum, and average closed-won deal values for each product.

name: products
description: List all products with their series and list prices.

name: product_prices
description: Show product names with series and sales prices.

name: sales_team_stats
description: Summarize sales teams by counting agents per manager and regional office.

name: sales_team_assignments
description: List sales agents with their managers, IDs, and regional offices.

name: sales_managers_by_region
description: List sales managers assigned to a specified regional office.

name: sales_managers
description: Show all sales agents with their managers and regional offices.

name: sales_pipeline_in-progress
description: List all active sales opportunities with stages and expected close dates.

name: lost_deals_last_year
description: Show deals lost last year with stages, values, and close dates.

name: big_deals_won
description: List won deals above 5000 in value sorted by deal size.

name: revenue_for_Q4
description: Show total revenue and won deal counts for fourth-quarter sales.

name: revenue_for_Q3
description: Show total revenue and won deal counts for third-quarter sales.

name: revenue_for_Q1
description: Show total revenue and won deal counts for first-quarter sales.

name: sales_last_month
description: Show total revenue and won deal counts from the past month.

name: revenue_for_Q2
description: Show total revenue and won deal counts for second-quarter sales.
